title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Ministers of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (ministers state department housing local government heritage) order 2024

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Hannah Hamilton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Hannah Hamilton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed as Special Adviser to Malcolm Noonan, Minister of State at the 
Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage with effect from 10 
April 2024.
text_norm: 2 hannah hamilton particular whose address deposited office department housing local government heritage appointed special adviser malcolm noonan minister state department housing local government heritage effect 10 april 2024

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: Jenny McCormack, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. 

Jenny McCormack, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage is 
appointed as Special Adviser to Alan Dillon, Minister of State at the Department 
of Housing, Local Government and Heritage with effect from 20 May 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th September, 2024.
